appointments.title: Appointments
appointments.create.grid.title: Create a schedule grid
appointments.create.grid.abandon.title: Abandon schedule creation?
appointments.create.grid.abandon.message: If you confirm, the entered information will be lost.
appointments.consultation.grid.title: Consult your expired schedule
appointments.modify.grid.title: Modify your schedule grid
appointments.modify.grid.alert: Fields affecting appointment booking cannot be modified (public, validity, slots, ...).
appointments.modify.grid.confirm.title: Modify your schedule?
appointments.modify.grid.confirm.message: If you confirm, the entered information will be saved and the modifications will be applied to all affected appointments.
appointments.modify.grid.abandon.title: Abandon modifications?
appointments.modify.grid.abandon.message: If you confirm, you will lose all ongoing modifications.
appointments.suspend.grid.confirm.title: Suspend your schedule?
appointments.suspend.grid.confirm.descri: If you confirm, your schedule will be suspended, and you will become unavailable for the affected slots.
appointments.suspend.grid.confirm.questi: You already have appointments booked during the affected period. Do you want to keep them?
appointments.restore.grid.confirm.title: Resume your schedule?
appointments.restore.grid.confirm.descri: If you confirm, your schedule will be reinstated, and you will become available again for the affected time slots.
appointments.delete.grid.confirm.title: Delete your schedule?
appointments.delete.grid.confirm.descrip: If you confirm, your schedule will be deleted and will no longer appear in your list.
appointments.delete.grid.confirm.questio: You already have appointments booked during the affected period. Do you want to keep them?
appointments.grid.name: Schedule name
appointments.grid.available.slots.warnin: Please add at least one slot.
appointments.grid.empty.state: You haven't defined a schedule yet.
appointments.grid.in.progress.empty.stat: You haven't defined a schedule for the coming days.
appointments.find.empty.state.search.bar: Use the search bar to find available people.
appointments.book.appointment.modal.vide: I want to attend this appointment via video call
appointments.book.appointment.modal.no.s: No open slots for these dates yet.
appointments.book.appointment.success: Your appointment request has been successfully sent.
This slot is no longer available. Please choose another.
appointments.book.appointment.internal.e: An error occurred while booking. Please try again.
appointments.my.appointments.accepted.em: You have no scheduled appointments. Use the 'Find an appointment' tab to schedule one.
appointments.cannot.cancel.request.toolt: Cancellation unavailable less than {{hours}}h before the appointment
appointments.error.same.grid.already.exi: This name is already in use.
appointments.error.one.slot.required: Please add at least one time slot.
